description.value:
As part of entering into the line of work of an engineer, all students have to first build their multi-tool - a powerful, engineer-exclusive weapon built from the ground up to suit you. You start play with a multi-tool built from the options outlined in the Engineer's Multi-Tool section. To build your multi-tool, go through each step of the multi-tool section one at a time.

You have 6 Tool Points (referred to going forward as TP) which you can use to design your multi-tool, but your major engineering invention might grant you more. Your magitek tool is a very interesting innovation indeed, and as you develop it you empower it more. You can only have a single multi-tool, unless you later gain a feat that allows you to create more.

You can freely upgrade and reconfigure your multi-tool's TP investments, so long as you do not remove traits it was given for free from other sources.

If your tool is two-handed, it has 2 Bulk. Otherwise, it has 1 Bulk. You are not bound to the decisions you made when you created your tool, and you can restructure it and reallocate its TP freely by using a full 6 hours of the Craft Project activity from Complete Crafting Overhaul. If your GM is not using CCO, instead you spend a full day of downtime.
